title: Kim Kardashian Selfish
description: The selfie photography of Kim Kardashian West, featuring many never-before-seen personal images from one of the most recognizable and iconic celebrities in the world. From her early beginnings as a wardrobe stylist through the release of a private sex tape, Kim Kardashian West has catapulted herself into becoming one of the most recognizable celebrities in Hollywood. With her successful reality TV show Keeping Up with the Kardashians she has acquired a massive following on social media through which Kim connects with her fans on a daily basis sharing details of her life with her selfie photography. For the first time in print, this book presents some of Kimâ€™s favorite selfies in one volume that will be enjoyed by all her fans.
author: Kim Kardashian West
